replies.bodyText:
The assertEquals on the JavaParser AST produces a much better diff when the twos are different, therefore it's really useful to fix this kind of test. Unfortunately it can't be used for the assertion as it requires the node of the AST to be identical, so it pretty much fails all the time. That's why I used the assertion on the string. After five minutes of trying to understand the diff between the strings I remembered this diff is far much better so I think it could be useful the next time we have to fix it.
Any suggestions are welcome though :)
